name: Crowguelike (FartFish, Lazernaut)
description:
Disclaimer! This isn't a finished build! I am releasing this to the public so that I can put it on my portfolio, as I have college apps coming up. Sorry for releasing something that isn't anywhere near completion! You may encounter some bugs.

Crows like shiny things, right? In Crowguelike, you collect shiny things and use them to vanquish your enemies! 

Known bug -- If you notice that there is still an "E" above a trapdoor while it's closed, complete a room, and when it's open, walk over it before pressing E. This should fix the issue. I'll try and figure out what's up  with that but it may be bit before I come back to this game.

Known bug #2 -- I think I just straight up forgot to create a death state or something sorry lol

Credits:

Art & Programming: FartFish (Yours truly)

Music: Lazernaut
